summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the east 64 feet of Lots 6 and 7, Block 97, Terry's 2nd Addition, and Lots 2 and 3, Block 131, A. A. Denny's Broadway Addition, with respect to Use Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto one new section numbered 2-197.
